author: cnbc.com
title: Dave Levy Joins Mercer’s Sunrise, Florida Office as Principal, Client Management
text:
SUNRISE, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Mercer , a global consulting leader in advancing health, wealth and career, and a wholly owned subsidiary of Marsh & McLennan Companies (NYSE:MMC), has appointed Dave Levy to Mercer’s Sunrise, Florida office as Principal, Client Management, Health. His responsibilities include managing clients in Mercer’s Health practice and helping them determine the right benefits solutions to fit their needs. Mr. Levy will report to Cory Lynn, Florida Market Business Leader.
“Dave is extremely well-respected for his industry knowledge and dedication to client service,” said Mr. Lynn. “His proven track record of success will help us further strengthen the support we provide for our Florida area clients.”
Prior to this role, Mr. Levy was the Senior Vice President at USI Insurance Services. In addition, he served as the Senior Vice President of Health and Benefits at Willis Towers Watson. Mr. Levy received his degree in Business Management from West Chester University.
About Mercer
Mercer delivers advice and technology-driven solutions that help organizations meet the health, wealth and career needs of a changing workforce. Mercer’s more than 22,000 employees are based in 44 countries and the firm operates in over 130 countries. Mercer is a wholly owned subsidiary of Marsh & McLennan Companies (NYSE:MMC), the leading global professional services firm in the areas of risk, strategy and people. With nearly 65,000 colleagues and annual revenue over $14 billion, through its market-leading companies including Marsh , Guy Carpenter and Oliver Wyman , Marsh & McLennan helps clients navigate an increasingly dynamic and complex environment. For more information, visit www.mercer.com . Follow Mercer on Twitter @Mercer .
